2: Find Kilbas in Khorinis, to the north.
4: Kill the bloodflies inside Kilbas' basement
6: Find the temple that can be opened with Kilbas' symbol.
7: Acquire the rune that you'll find inside the temple.
8: Show the rune stone of fire to Kilbas.
9: Seek help from Celdric, at the abbey to the northeast.
12: Visit Tunas at his lighthouse located on the north-western coast.
13: Acquire 200 gold pieces in order to afford the petroleum.
14: Bring Tunas the petroleum from Khorinis.
17: Take the mail shirt to Jesbar.
19: Get the booze from Teakil's farm.
20: Transport the booze to the abbey's guard.
22: Pay a tax of 200 gold pieces to the Order of Blood.
23: Get Volsufric's booze from the order's adversaries.
25: Rescue Idra's sister from the Order of Blood. Talk to the residents to gather information about the Order.
27: Use Idra's symbol to open the temple to the south of Tirith.
29: Talk to Monrar who is located at his tower east of Tirith.
30: Use Monrar's Symbol to open the temple in Khorinis.
31: Take the last important rune stone from the temple in Khorinis.
32: Meet the Chosen ones in the abbey.
34: Kill the bloodhounds in the northern cave.
35: Tell the guard of your success.
38: Tell the widow what has happened.
39: Take the widow's portrait to the deceased.
40: Ask the widow for a reward.
42: Free Samel's mate by distracting the guard.
43: Tell Samel that you have freed his mate.
44: Samel will train you for free, now.
45: The betrayed thief and his mate
46: Wait until Samel got arrested and get the reward from the guard.
47: Samel will still train you at the prison.
51: Give Teakil the necklace of his brother.
52: Teakil is offering magic items now.
55: Find the rune in the temple in the north of Initria.
56: Meet Idra and talk about the rune stones.
58: Chase off the bandits of the other part of the cave.
59: Tell the orc-leader, that you have chased off the bandits.
61: Search for the cave where Kilbas is hold hostage.
62: Rescue Kilbas from the bandit's clutches.
68: Kill the orcs in the other part of the cave.
69: Tell the bandit's leader about your success.
